dialogues.text: Delight in our Nacho Cheese Hotsprings! Allow your kids to eat all the junk food they want in our completely unsupervised Kidz Zone! Cal is among the kids playing in piles of junkfood.

dialogues.speaker: CAL
dialogues.text: I have jelly beans for teeth!  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 63.

dialogues.speaker: MAYOR
dialogues.text: And when the fun is done, gaze upon the sunset cresting over Mount Leftovers! From which we're protected by a presumably indestructible dam! Outtasighters launch leftovers onto an ever-growing mound behind the dam. MAYOR (CONT’D) We've got people here today from all around the world. From as far as China to West Virginia. Also, I think there’s some Canadians here... BACKSTAGE ON FLINT, looking around through the enormous curtain of himself. Flint nervously slicks down his hair. He wears a tuxedo t-shirt. Sam approaches.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Flint you need to look at this.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Why aren’t you on TV? You’re supposed to be broadcasting this.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: There’s a problem. I think the food's getting bigger--

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: I know, it’s great. Bigger portion sizes. Everyone loves it. He gestures to passersby catching a jumbo jumbo prawn.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Flint, I’m not sure we're doing the right thing here.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: (HEATED) Sam, listen--

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: What if we’ve bitten off more than we can chew?

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Ugh. For the first time in my life, everybody loves something that I’ve done. (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Why can’t you just be happy for me and go say the weather or something? Jeez. Flint turns away from her. Sam is shocked.

dialogues.speaker: MAYOR, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: And without further ado, our town’s hero, and my metaphorical son, Flint Lockwood! Flint runs out to grand APPLAUSE. He soaks it in.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Thank you! Thank you everyone! Yeah! Woo!

dialogues.speaker: CROWD
dialogues.text: Yeah! Flint! / Sign my shrimp! / Flint Lockwood! / I admire your quirkiness!

dialogues.speaker: MAYOR
dialogues.text: Brent, we’re gonna need you to hand over the ceremonial scissors. ON BRENT, who can’t believe it.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: But... The scissors are taken and handed to Flint.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: No! You can’t--! You can’t take them! No! I’m Baby Brent! Desperate, he pulls off his clothes, down to his diaper.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (PATHETICALLY) Uh-oh!

dialogues.speaker: CROWD / JOE TOWNE
dialogues.text: Boo! / Put your clothes back on!

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: Who am I?! Brent runs away, crying. Flint gets the scissors. He feels how beautiful they are.

dialogues.speaker: CROWD
dialogues.text: Lockwood! Lockwood!  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 65.

dialogues.speaker: MAYOR
dialogues.text: (WHISPERS) Go ahead, Flint. Everybody loves you. The crowd ROARS! The Nacho Cheese Hotsprings shoot Bellag style cheese fountains! Behind him, the Mayor slips away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tim still grinds chum, alone. The celebratory chanting of “Lockwood” can be heard faintly in the distance. Tim SIGH

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flint closes his eyes as he cuts the ribbon. Suddenly, a flock of ratbirds take off. Steve senses something and starts screaming.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Danger! Danger! Danger! Steve runs off. The wind picks up. Flint SNEEZES. Then everyone SNEEZES. Flint TASTES THE AIR.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Salt and pepper wind...? SMACK! Flint is HIT by a giant DRY LEAF. He SNIFFS it.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (OH NO) Oregano. A look of horror in his eyes. ZOOM out to see... a massiv SPAGHETTI TORNADO, ten blocks away, heading toward them.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Mamma Mia! He turns back to Sam, who gives him an angry glare then r off towards her van, determined.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sam, wait, no! I can turn it off! Flint looks up at the twister...then past it at his lab.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (DETERMINED) I can turn it off...  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 66. He gives a primal SCREAM and runs towards his lab, with t twister in between! We follow him as huge MEATBALLS smash down around him as everyone else runs away in the opposit direction.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey, kids, it’s all gonna be okay-- Oh, no. And he gets sucked into the pasta twister. Inside it’s ca Flint runs in the air past a MAN IN A TUB...

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Pardon me...

dialogues.speaker: MAN IN TUB
dialogues.text: Pardon me! ...then reaches Joe Towne, sitting in his car as it float through the eye of the storm. Flint opens the back passen door, climbs through, and exits the other side of the car still flying.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Excuse me.

dialogues.speaker: JOE TOWNE
dialogues.text: Aw, no problem. He flies out of the twister and LOSES HIS LAB COAT...

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: No! .--but keeps air-running over pieces of debris (garlic br stop signs, mailboxes, a stepladder) as though they were stairs until he’s back on the ground, in front of the lab Steve’s there waiting for him outside of the Port-A-Potty

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Gummi Bears.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Not now, Steve. Steve hops onto his shoulder and they enter the Port-a-Po

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The twister is headed for Sardine Circle. The cruise ship back up and peel out of town as fast as possible.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 67.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the restaurant, everyone holds out their plates expectantly. A WAITER walks by with condiments.

dialogues.speaker: WAITER
dialogues.text: Condiments? Pepper? Giant spaghetti and sauce buries them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON TIM, in the Tackle Shop, watching people outside panic

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: (WORRIED) Flint... Just then an enormous meatball nearly demolishes his shop ON SAM, through Manny’s handheld camera, as she gives a report. She’s still in her glasses and ponytail.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: This is Sam Sparks live from Chewandswallow, where a spaghetti twister-- She is inset by the ANCHOR.

dialogues.speaker: WNN ANCHOR
dialogues.text: Whoa, whoa, Sam, hey! We love a good storm over here, but you look like a nerd!

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: (IGNORING HIM) Patrick, several children are stranded in the path of this tomato tornado. IN THE KIDZONE, Cal and the other kids look up from gorgi themselves and try to run...only they are slow and fat an crippled by STOMACH ACHES. Most crawl their way out but C

dialogues.speaker: CAL
dialogues.text: ...oooh, my tummy hurts... ON EARL, who sees Cal on the TV monitors in the TV repair shop...

dialogues.speaker: EARL
dialogues.text: Cal! ...and he makes a break for him.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 68.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: It’s becoming a spinning semolina nightmare, twirling a path of--

dialogues.speaker: WNN ANCHOR
dialogues.text: Yikes. What is that, a scrunchie? I haven’t seen one of those since
We hear O.S. LAUGHTER in the studio.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: We have an actual weather emergency- Then she gets smashed by a garlic bread. The feed goes ou

dialogues.speaker: WNN ANCHOR
dialogues.text: (LAUGHING THROUGH TEARS) Well, we'll get right back to that storm, and hopefully Sam will look a little more appealing. (PRESSING BUTTON) Boop! They switch over to footage of a puppy in a field with different local temperatures CHYRONED over it. INT. FLINT’S LAB - DAY Flint bursts in. Steve is clinging to Flint’s head.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: (PANTING) Steve, we just have to upload the kill code and it will shutdown the -- OAAAAAAAH no, what are you doing here?! REVEAL the Mayor, furiously typing at Flint’s computer.

dialogues.speaker: MAYOR
dialogues.text: I’ve been up here ordering up dinner for the last ten minutes. Why? Is something going on?

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: I’ve gotta stop the machine. Everyone’s in danger because of me. Flint rushes for the machine in an attempt to turn it off is bounced away by the mayor’s large belly.

dialogues.speaker: MAYOR
dialogues.text: Oh, it can’t be that bad.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 69. The Mayor hits the big red “SEND” button.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: (NERVOUS NOISE) No! Foods start to cycle on the computer screen, which create SCARY STROBE LIGHTING EFFECT.

dialogues.speaker: MAYOR
dialogues.text: Well, I’m outta here.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: (DETERMINED) I can still stop the order with the kill code! Flint makes it to the computer and types. He’s about to h the SEND button and stop the machine...

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sending kill code...

dialogues.speaker: MAYOR
dialogues.text: I’m back! .-+-but the Mayor chokes him with a jumbo JUMBO PRAWN, dragging him away.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: (CHOKING) Got to get the button! Flint grabs a huge HOT PEPPER and shoves it in the Mayor’ eye.

dialogues.speaker: AAAAHHH
dialogues.text: Flint races back... Steve rolls around, having a great time tossing food.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Play, fun, fun, play, fun!

dialogues.speaker: MAYOR
dialogues.text: Hey, Flint! It’s been nice to beet you! The Mayor tosses a big RADISH at Flint.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: That’s a radish! Flint in midair dodges the beet/radish and it flies on, a smashes into the satellite dish, blowing it up. BOOM!  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 70.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Uh-oh. The satellite is in a million pieces. Flint finally pushe the button. Nothing happens. ON THE SCREEN: “ERROR: CONNECTION LOST. KILL CODE NOT SEN

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: That was the only way to communicate with the machine... (GRAVE) What exactly did you order?

dialogues.speaker: MAYOR
dialogues.text: A Vegas-style all-you-can-eat buffet? They all stare up at the monitor. Oh no.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now almost completely covered in food, the FLDSMDFR monit glows an ominous RED.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Overhead: the clouds part. The twister is gone. But it ha created a path of mess and destruction in its wake. People start coming out of the mess, stunned. Two of them are SAM AND MANNY. Sam coughs.

dialogues.speaker: JOE TOWNE
dialogues.text: Everyone okay?

dialogues.speaker: TOWNSPEOPLE
dialogues.text: Yeah. / Yep. / I'm good. Sam opens up the Doppler. Earl runs up with Cal in his ar

dialogues.speaker: EARL
dialogues.text: Help, somebody! Help me please! It’s my son.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: We need a doctor! Is anyone here a doctor? Anyone?!

dialogues.speaker: MANNY
dialogues.text: (STEPPING UP) I am a doctor.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 71.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: You are?

dialogues.speaker: MANNY
dialogues.text: I was, back in Guatemala. I came here for a better life. Pretty great decision, eh? Manny pulls out a STETHOSCOPE and listens to Cal’s heart.

dialogues.speaker: EARL
dialogues.text: How is he, doc?

dialogues.speaker: MANNY
dialogues.text: (SERIOUS) He’s in a food coma.

dialogues.speaker: REALLY CONCERNED MAN
dialogues.text: Oh no! Everyone GASPS, especially Earl.

dialogues.speaker: MANNY
dialogues.text: Too much junk food. I need a celery. Stat! Someone hands him a stalk of celery.

dialogues.speaker: JOE TOWNE
dialogues.text: Here you go. Manny snaps it in half under Cal’s nose. Cal COUGHS and wakes up.

dialogues.speaker: CAL
dialogues.text: Daddy?

dialogues.speaker: EARL
dialogues.text: Oh, Cal... Cal! I love you, son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Earl kisses Cal on the lips and smiles.

dialogues.speaker: EARL
dialogues.text: Looks like everything turned out okay.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Not yet it hasn’t. That spaghetti twister was just an amuse bouche compared to what’s on the way.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 72.

dialogues.speaker: TOWNSPERSON
dialogues.text: (WHISPERS) What’s an amuse bouche?

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Manny, patch us through. Manny prepares for a broadcast. The satellite goes up. He plugs in some cables.

dialogues.speaker: SAM, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Inset is an attractive woman with the headline “OTTERS GE WET!”

dialogues.speaker: WNN ANCHOR
dialogues.text: Cute report, Nancy!

dialogues.speaker: KZZHHHHSSHHH
dialogues.text: WNN ANCHOR (CONT’D) Hey! Four eyes?! Sam has pirated in from CHEWANDSWALLOW! As she speaks, we cut around the world to see people’s horrified reactions.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Can it, Patrick! We are about to be in the epicenter of a perfect foodstorm. It’s going to spread across the globe. I’ve calculated the Coriolis acceleration of the storm system. First it’ll hit New York, then Paris, then the Jianguang Pass in Eastern China. And in four hours, the entire Northern Hemisphere will be one big potluck. ON TIM, walking out of the Tackle Shop to survey the mess He looks over at the power line and sees Flint’s dirty LA COAT. He picks it up and looks at it. Clouds form.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tim enters and hears a low moan.

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: Flint?  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 73. He follows the sound and finds Flint in a rusty barrel, curled up under some junk.

dialogues.speaker: TIM, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Flint?

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Hey, Dad.

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Well, I tried to help everybody, but instead I ruined everything. I’m just a piece of junk. So TI threw myself away. Along with all these dumb inventions. (RE: SPRAY- ON SHOES, ETC) This is junk. This is junk. (RE: SELF) This is junk.

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: Look, son, you... Listen, when your boat is... When it’s listing, if it’s not running... You know, uh--

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Don’t worry, Dad, I get it. Mom was wrong about me. I’m not an inventor. I should’ve just quit when you said. Tim looks at his son in a trashcan, as low as can be.

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: Well, when it rains, you put ona coat. He holds up Flint’s lab coat.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Dad, you know I don’t understand fishing meta-- Flint looks up to see the lab coat.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: What...? Flint stands up in the barrel, junk falling off him, and takes the coat.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 74.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: My coat. Flint looks at it for a beat, then realizes what his dad means, looks back for Tim, but he’s gone into the house. Flint looks back to his coat and gets a determined look.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Come on, Steve, we've got diem to carpe. Steve pops up out of the trashcan next to Flint. INT. ELEVATOR/FLINT’S LAB Flint and Steve up to the lab in heroi-comic fashion. SUPER FAST MONTAGE: He downloads the termination recipe o a USB flash drive. Flint draws up plans. Pushes buttons. Calculates something. Measures something. Welds something

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Kill code downloading. Redesigning. Virtualizing. Cutting. Welding. Forging. Wiring. Steve hits a bucket with a spoon.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Helping. Flint presses a button and jet engines shoot above him.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Testing. Yes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The doors of a secret garage open. Then headlights turn o and a CRAZY CAR drives towards us with Flint and Steve in looking determined.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Flying Car 2... Now with wings. Wings pop out of the car. Awesome.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 75.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A giant WATERMELON smashes into the cannery sending goop huge seeds flying all over town! Sam dives out of the way of a massive CANDY CORN, just be it flattens a truck. A dozen enormous CHOCOLATE DONUTS roll down the street, chasing Joe Towne and others.

dialogues.speaker: JOE TOWNE
dialogues.text: I had a weird dream like this once! A Man with a giant MACARONI over his head runs around blindly, trying to get it off.

dialogues.speaker: MACARONI GUY
dialogues.text: I have a macaroni on my head! An enormous pancake covers the school. Kids outside watch excited.

dialogues.speaker: KIDS
dialogues.text: No school! A CHERRY breaks a shop window and a man steals a TV. The walking TV breaks the window next to it and steals a man. Amid the chaos and panic: SCREECH! Flint rolls up, steps out of the car, faces the crowd, and a still-mad Sam.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Everyone! I want to apologize. Especially to you, Sam. But I have a plan. This flashdrive contains a kill code. I will fly up into that foodstorm, plug it into the machine and shut it down forever, while you guys evacuate the island using--

dialogues.speaker: MAYOR
dialogues.text: This is all his fault! Get him!

dialogues.speaker: CROWD / JOE TOWNE
dialogues.text: There he is! / Get him! / Let’s rock his car back and forth! Flint JUMPS back into his car and Steve locks the door. People start rocking the car. Earl enters.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 76.

dialogues.speaker: HEY
dialogues.text: Everyone stops in their tracks. Earl flips onto the hood.

dialogues.speaker: EARL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: This mess we’re in, it’s all our faults. Me, it was my job to protect and serve the people, and I didn’t even protect my own son. On the crowd, NODDING in agreement. Sam, Brent, others.

dialogues.speaker: EARL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Look, I’m as mad at Flint as you are. In fact, when he gets out of that car, I’m going to slap him in the face. I know Flint Lockwood made the food, but it was made to order. And now it’s time for all of us to pay the bill. The crowd CLAPS. Steve licks the windshield. Flint gets o and gets on the hood.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Thank you, Earl. Earl SLAPS Flint.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: ow.

dialogues.speaker: EARL
dialogues.text: Sorry.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: It’s okay.

dialogues.speaker: EARL
dialogues.text: (TO CROWD) Let’s go build some boats! The crowd CHEERS. Earl exits. Sam steps onto the hood.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: I’m coming with you. You’re gonna need someone to navigate you through that storm. (SOFTENS) I can’t let you do this alone.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Oh, Sam, I’m so sorry--  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 77. He goes in for a kiss and gets denied. Again.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Are you kidding?

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Well, I just thought that--

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Okay. Manny steps onto the car.

dialogues.speaker: MANNY
dialogues.text: You are going to need a copilot.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: You're a pilot too?

dialogues.speaker: MANNY
dialogues.text: Yes. I am also a particle physicist.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Really?

dialogues.speaker: MANNY
dialogues.text: No, that was a joke. I am also a comedian. All LAUGH.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Ha! Ha! Hal

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Let’s do this, every--

dialogues.speaker: BRENT, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: I’m coming, too. Brent steps onto the hood. He’s heavy.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: (POLITE) Brent! Uh, that’s okay.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: No, it’s not okay. I've been coasting on my fame since I was a baby... (MORE )

dialogues.speaker: BRENT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: but it was all just an illusion. Maybe up there, I’11l find out who I really am.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Uh, car’s pretty full, so... But Flint can’t turn down Brent and his puppydog expressi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everybody is jammed in the car. Flint drives, Manny sits the console, Sam is in passenger seat, and Brent and Stev are in the back.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: (LAUGHS) Yeah! Brent!

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Okay. Flint, with new resolve, takes off in the car-plane. They pass a flock of ratbirds who seem to nod solemnly as Flin gives them a thumbs up. They fly by Tim outside the tackle shop.

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: (TO HIMSELF) Good luck, son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TRIUMPHANT MUSIC PLAYS as the weird, rickety car-plane ta off!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flint steers through clouds as G-force makes the plane sh like crazy. Everyone makes SHAKY NOISES.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: (SHAKY) Steeeeeve. The Doppler goes off. A GREEN MIST covers the windshield.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Pea soup fog! They're flying blind. Something hits them. Whooaa! Whoosh  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 79.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Manny, hit the wipers! Manny pushes twelve buttons...

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: (RE: DOPPLER) Flint, there's massive gastroprecipitation accumulated around the machine. It’s almost as if it’s-- ...-Manny finishes his button pushing sequence and the wi finally come on.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: (GRAVE) Inside a giant meatball. Everyone looks out the window. As they emerge from the fo REVEAL a FOOD ASTEROID -- a huge mass of congealed food w food-blasting blowholes. The FLDSMDFR in the center. Sam looks out the window, seeing white clouds sucked in through the top; black food clouds shoot out the bottom.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Water goes in the top, a food hurricane comes out the bottom.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: I’m glad I’m wearing a diaper. They continue their approach to the monstrous meatball. A PIZZA PIE breaks apart into slices that follow them. Sam looks in the sideview mirror and sees them as they shoot pepperonis like bullets.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Anybody order pizza?

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: The pizza’s chasing us?

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Sentient food? That’s impossible.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Unless its molecular structure's mutated into superfood--

dialogues.speaker: FLINT / SAM
dialogues.text: --that’s been genetically engineered to protect the FLDSMDFR.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 80.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Pizza!

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Pizza, pizza, pizza! They REACT as a topping hits the plane. A cool PIZZA SLIC DOGFIGHT ensues! Flint is a bad pilot, and in the ruckus almost drops the flashdrive.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Whew! That was close. I mean, can you imagine if we lost this kill code? PTONG! A MUSHROOM SLICE breaks a window and knocks the fl drive out of Flint’s hand and out the window. Long beat.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: Uh-oh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huge food SMASHES the buildings on all sides of Tim’s Tac Shop. RING, RING. Tim answers his old land-line phone.

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: Tim’s Tackle Shop.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flint is on his phone mid-pizza dogfight.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Dad, you're okay, great! Um, I need a favor, the fate of the world depends on it.

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: Okay, then, skipper, what do you need?

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: I just need you to go into my lab, get on a computer and e-mail a file to my cell phone.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 81. Beat of Tim wide-eyed with the notion of using a computer

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: Ummmm-uhhh... Alright. Tim hangs up. The dogfight continues. Flint is still a bad pilot.

dialogues.speaker: MANNY
dialogues.text: Want me to drive?

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Yeah, okay. Manny is an awesome pilot, outflanking the pizzas with ea

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Wow. You’re a lot better than me.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Uh-huh. They come upon the huge INTAKE HOLE that is sucking cloud into the top of meateroid. Flint turns the Doppler map and points.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Okay, here’s the plan. Sam and I will enter the meateroid through the intake here, which should lead us straight to the FLDSMDFR. Manny, you and Steve will stay on the plane. (GRABS CAN OF SPRAY-ON SHOES FROM STEVE) Don’t spray that in your mouth. Once my dad emails me the kill code, we'll destroy the machine, and rendezvous here at the Western blowhole in... how long until the world’s destroyed?

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: About twenty minutes.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Just before then.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: What about me, Brent, what do I do?

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Uh, you can be president of the backseat.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 82.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: (EXCITED, THEN) Oh.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Deploy hatch! The hatch pops off like on an F-16.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Car upside down... go! Manny does a barrel roll and Flint and Sam fall onto the plane ceiling. They stare out the hatch to the long drop.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Ladies first? No? Alright. Flint, then Sam (still clutching the Doppler) LEAP out in the huge, meaty hole. Brent JUMPS OUT after them...

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: Wait for me! ...except that he gets stuck in the hatch.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (STRUGGLING) I’m good. Finally he pops free and falls after them. Sam and Flint free fall down the hole, unaware of Brent.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: (YELLING) As long as we stay on course, it should be a straight shot to the-- Brent SLAMS into them and takes them off course.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Aaah!

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Aaaah!

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: Yeah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flint, Sam and Brent tumble into a pitch black tunnel. OO

dialogues.speaker: ALL
dialogues.text: Ooof!  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 83.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: We're a team!!!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flint creates a TORCH from a marshmallow and a shrimp ske and lights it on a flaming cherries jubilee. It illuminat the scary walls of a tunnel made of giant congealed food.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Whoa.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: (POINTS TO DOPPLER MAP) We've landed here in some kind of exhaust vent. But if we go this way, the FLDSMDNSFDR should be right down this air shaft. (THEN) Brent, get out of that pie. Brent is eating a pie in the wall.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: (MOUTH FULL) What’s up? EXT. TIM’S BACKYARD - MOMENTS LATER Tim faces the PORT-A-POTTY elevator...and pauses, relucta Then he gets in and flushes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tim shoots up the tube, SCREAMING. INT. FLINT’S LAB - MOMENTS LATER Tim enters with awe and faces the computer, showdown styl

dialogues.speaker: LAB COMPUTER
dialogues.text: Welcome, Flint.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flint, Sam and Brent face a huge cavern which has a river boiling hot oil running through it. And they have to get the other side!

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: That's fry oil.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 84. They carefully begin to cross it, using french fries and chicken nuggets as floating platforms. As they cross-- PHONE: “Flint you have a call, Flint you have a call.”

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (INTO PHONE) Dad! Uh, okay, great. On the screen there’s a file marked “kill code.”

dialogues.speaker: WITH
dialogues.text: INT. FLINT’S LAB - CONTINUOUS Tim stares at the computer as if it were a spaceship.

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: Wha...? Huh?

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Move that into my e-mail window, type in my name and press “send.” Tim looks around the lab for a window.

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: Window?

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Okay, Dad. You see the thing that looks like a little piece of paper?

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Use the mouse to drag it.

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: Drag it?

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Drag it.

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: Drag it?

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Drag it. Tim puts the mouse on the screen and tries to move the ar  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 85.

dialogues.speaker: TIM FLINT
dialogues.text: Mm-hm, mm-hm, mm-hm... Great. Okay, great. Okay, great.

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: It’s not dragging.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Drag it across the desktop. Tim literally drags the keyboard across the top of the de Papers, equipment and the keyboard CRASH onto the floor.

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: That didn’t do anything.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Of course it didn’t! You know what? Aaaaarghh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Townspeople build boats out of giant sandwiches and swiss cheese sails with pretzel stick masts as Earl instructs t

dialogues.speaker: EARL
dialogues.text: Go! Go! Go! Hoist those sails! Toast that bread! We’re running out of time! Earl stops and looks up as the Dam starts to rumble ominously. Earls chest hairs tingle.

dialogues.speaker: EARL, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Let’s move out! Go! Go! Go! We can do it! Come on, move it, move it, good job, that’s what I’m talking about! Everybody head to the docks!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone runs out of the pancake, holding the boats over their heads. They dodge enormous food. As the first boat arrives at the docks, the Mayor arrives from out of nowhere and PLOWS through the crowd.

dialogues.speaker: MAYOR
dialogues.text: Wait, wait! I have an important announcement. (BEAT) See ya, suckers!  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 86. He steals the first bread boat and shoves off. MAYOR (0.S.) (CONT’D) Bon voyage... and bon appetit! He chows down on his own bread boat as he sails away. Everyone on the docks is mad. Meanwhile, Earl, Regina and Cal run with their boat, but loses his grip and falls.

dialogues.speaker: EARL
dialogues.text: Cal?!

dialogues.speaker: REGINA
dialogues.text: Calvin! Cal looks up at the dam. A cherry lands on top of the foo mound... and the Dam breaks open! A massive AVALANCHE OF FOOD sweeps into town, destroying buildings.

dialogues.speaker: EARL
dialogues.text: Cal, get back here!

dialogues.speaker: CAL
dialogues.text: (STUNNED) Foodalanche.

dialogues.speaker: EARL
dialogues.text: Cal! I’m not gonna lose you again! Earl picks Cal up and starts running.

dialogues.speaker: REGINA
dialogues.text: Baby! Earl TOSSES CAL to Regina. Then he picks up their boat an carries it -- with his family on it -- towards the water the foodalanche rolls towards them, right on his heels.

dialogues.speaker: REGINA, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hold on tight, Calvin! A GIANT CHERRY flies at them and Regina bats it away with candy cane. Earl leaps into the air with his wife, child and boat, through a huge falling nacho chip and they all LAND SAFEL the water, pushed out to sea by the foodalanche.

dialogues.speaker: EARL
dialogues.text: Everybody head south! We’ve got to stay ahead of that storm!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: INT. FLINT’S LAB / MEATEROID - CONTINUOUS The foodalanche is headed for Flint’s lab. Tim is still trying to send that email.

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: Now what?

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Just click send!

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Flint, the FLDSMDFR is right down there!

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Dad, hurry!

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: Send? Send...? Oh, wait-- BAM! The foodalanche crashes in. Before he can hit the button, Tim is knocked over. Flint hears cacophony on the line.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Dad? Dad?! Can you hear me? Dad?!

dialogues.speaker: BOK-CHK-BOK-CHK.
dialogues.text: Brent turns and looks around, SCARED. But Flint is still focused on his phone.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: Hey guys? Sam and Flint turn to see giant ROAST CHICKENS covering t ceiling a la the Aliens in Aliens.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: (SOTTO) Holy crapballs. They try to run... FLINT (CONT’D) Go, go, gO, go, go, go, go! .--but the roast chickens drop down and surround them!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The lead chicken approaches Brent.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: Aw, I don’t know, I think they’re kind of cute. I mean, this one just walked up to me and-- In one horrifying move, the biggest roast chicken SWALLOW Brent down his gullet.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (MUFFLED) Aaaaaahhh!

dialogues.speaker: FLINT / SAM
dialogues.text: They ate Breeeennnnt!!!! The chickens totally surround Flint and Sam and there’s n escape. INT. FLINT’S LAB / MEATEROID - INTERCUT

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: (TERRIFIED) Dad, I’m surrounded by man-eating chickens right now. Look, I realize this whole time you were just trying to get me to do the right thing. I just hope I still can. (THEN) Okaybye. At this, Tim’s arm emerges from the rubble! Then he DRAGS his whole body out of the food, reaches for the mouse and pushes the button. SEND! Flint looks at his phone and sees “Email Received. Subjec Kill Code. 1 attachment”

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Dad! A chicken swallows the phone out of Flint’s hand.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Hey, give me that phone back! He reaches for the phone, but suddenly another chicken fa over, SCREAMING and CONVULSING. The other chickens lean i to see what’s happening. Brent shoves his head through the neck of the chicken and assumes control of its arms and legs.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: RAAAAAAAH! Uh-oh!  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 89.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Baby Brent?

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: I’m not Baby Brent anymore. I’m Chicken Brent! He pulls out his diaper and drops it on the floor.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: And I'm finally contributing to society! Crotch kick! He PUNCHES and KICKS the other chickens with a vengeance. Flint’s Cell phone pops out of one of them. He picks up F and Sam and gets them out of harms way for the moment.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Now go, you crazy kids, and save the world.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: You did it, Chicken Brent! You really did it.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: Go, go, go, go! Flint and Sam escape while Chicken Brent stays behind and holds off the chickens.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: It should be right down this... hole. They skid to a stop as we REVEAL a deep, nasty looking pi lined with stalactites.

dialogues.speaker: SAM, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: That’s peanut brittle. If either one of us touches it, we’ll go into anaphylactic shock. Flint looks guilty.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Actually, I’m not entirely allergic to peanuts. I might have just said that to get you to like me.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: So you really thought having allergies would make you more attractive?  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 90.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Ehhhhhhhh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Manny adeptly steers around various oncoming foods.

dialogues.speaker: MANNY
dialogues.text: There’s the Western blowhole, Steve. Steve tries to grab Manny’s pencil thin moustache.

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Moustache... moust--! Manny GRUNTS at him and he recoils. Wide, we see the black clouds spreading.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Black clouds roll in. Everyone looks up. On the jumbotron sign reads “TRY BAGELS - SUPRISINGLY HIGH IN CALORIES!” CRASH! A huge bagel takes out the sign!

dialogues.speaker: NEW YORK WOMAN
dialogues.text: Sesame bagel! A CUSTOMER holds his hot dog up to a VENDOR.

dialogues.speaker: CUSTOMER
dialogues.text: I asked for extra mustard. And EXTRA MUSTARD drenches him from above. Two HOMELESS PROPHETS stand next to each other wearing sandwich boards. One reads “The World Ends Tomorrow.” The other reads “The World Ends Today.” Prophet #1 is crushed a PRETZEL.

dialogues.speaker: PROPHET
dialogues.text: Haha! I was right!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A CLUB SANDWICH uses the Eiffel Tower as a toothpick.

dialogues.speaker: FRECHMAN
dialogues.text: Sacre bleu!  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 91. TOURISTS enjoy the manmade beauty of Mt. Rushmore -- unti the presidents are smashed with CREAM PIES!!

dialogues.speaker: TOURISTS
dialogues.text: Aaaaaaaaaahhhh! HOT TEA rains down on Big Ben...and Londoners.

dialogues.speaker: LONDONERS
dialogues.text: Hot tea! / It’s scalding! At the GREAT WALL OF CHINA, a giant fortune cookie lands breaks open. A tourist reads the fortune:

dialogues.speaker: TOURIST
dialogues.text: You are about to be crushed by a giant corn. Just then, a giant cob of corn rolls down the wall toward the tourists.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The WNN Anchor reports from the newsdesk.

dialogues.speaker: WNN ANCHOR
dialogues.text: It looks like the foodstorm is following an unusual pattern of hitting the world’s most famous landmarks first and is now spreading to the rest of the-- A GIANT PRETZEL crashes into the newsroom. WNN ANCHOR (CONT’D) What the what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brent is STRUGGLING to hold off the chickens.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: Hurry up, guys! Using a LICORICE ROPE, Sam lowers Flint down the shaft. Sam STRUGGLES with Flint’s weight.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 92.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: After I plug my phone into the FLDSMDFR and destroy it, I'll tug on the licorice twice and you'll pull me back up, okay?

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: (STRUGGLING) Sounds great. RUMBLE! Flint SCREAMS as Sam loses her grip on the licori rope and he falls. Sam regains control of the rope, but slips down the shaft the midst of a bunch of peanut brittle shards.

dialogues.speaker: SAM, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Agh. Sam looks down at her arm. It’s been cut!

dialogues.speaker: SAM, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Oh no.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: You got cut, didn’t you. Sam's arm and face swell up like a balloon.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: (SUPER STUFFED) It’s just a scratch. (SNORTS UP PHLEGM)

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Brent, you need to take Sam back to the plane to get her an allergy shot! Brent is kicked and punched by a group of angry chickens.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: Just a second...

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: What? No!

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Let go, Sam.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: I’m not gonna let you go. Flint, you'll be stuck down there. Flint looks down into the dark pit, then back up at Sam.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 93.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: It’s not ideal, no.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: (DESPERATE) Come with us. We/’1l start over. We’1ll live underground. Use bacon for clothes.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Sam, that’s not a very good plan.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: It is if it means I don’t have to lose you! (BEAT) Look, I like you, okay.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Like-- Like, as a friend? Her head still is swollen and pink.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: No. Like, like you like you.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Me too. But about you. He BITES the licorice rope, falling into the blackness.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Goodbye, Sam.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Flint! No! Sam stumbles backwards and falls. Chickens swarm her, unt Brent arrives! He tosses her onto his back and races out through the tun bowling over the other chickens.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: Hang on, Sam! Dr. Manny’s got the medicine for your face!

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Aaaaahhh! Flint LANDS, pulls himself up and discovers he’s in an enormous food cavern.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 94. At the center is the FLDSNDMFR, in a uvula-like column of gelatin, above an undulating pit. The machine “inhales” a bunch of clouds and releases a mass of black smoke down t pit.

dialogues.speaker: MACHINE VOICE
dialogues.text: (FOOD WALLA)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brent PANTS as he gallops down the food tunnel with Sam o his back, chased by chickens.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: (GROGGY) Manny, we’re on our way, hurry...

dialogues.speaker: MANNY, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Hang on, Sam, I’m circling the blowhole.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Manny adeptly steers. THUNK, THUNK -- something hits the underside of the wings.

dialogues.speaker: MANNY
dialogues.text: Was is das? Steve jumps up onto Manny’s face, then hides under the se

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Scared. On the wing, large GUMMI BEARS pull themselves up and tea the wing apart. The plane plummets. Terrified, Steve slowly raises his head and looks out the window. His eyes open wide in shocked glee. STEVE (CONT’D) Gummi bears! STEVE’S DREAM SEQUENCE:

dialogues.speaker: GUMMI BEARS
dialogues.text: Play with us, play with us / Eat us, eat us.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 95.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO SCENE
dialogues.text: Steve leaps out onto the wing, DEVOURING the gummi bears RIPPING APART their cute Gummi bodies. Heads and limbs fl

dialogues.speaker: FALLING GUMMI BEAR
dialogues.text: (SCREAMS )

dialogues.speaker: STEVE
dialogues.text: Steve. HUNGRY! HUNGRY! GUMMI

dialogues.speaker: BEARS
dialogues.text: But the plane is still in a tailspin!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brent reaches the end of the tunnel and pauses. There’s n sign of Manny.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: Ohhhh, Manny where are you?! ON STEVE, who rips out the heart of the last Gummi Bear a eats it. ON BRENT, looking back FEARFULLY as the chickens close in With no choice, he leaps out of the blowhole into mid-air SCREAMING as he plummets... But Manny flies in at the last second and Brent SLAMS int the windshield.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Brent lowers Sam into the plane.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Uuuugh. Oh, boy...

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: She touched a peanut or something!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flint makes his way toward the machine, HUMMING HIS SOUNDTRACK and moving like a kid pretending to be an acti hero. He accidentally steps on a tortilla chip, CRUNCH, alerting the machine to his presence.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 96. Immediately the top half of the uvula lifts the FLDSMDFR and it fires a GIANT CORN at Flint.

dialogues.speaker: MACHINE VOICE
dialogues.text: Corn. The corn rips into the ground in front of him, digging a crater in the spot where Flint was just standing. The machine noses forward, still attached to the uvula, a uses a beam of light to scan the room for Flint -- he’s nowhere to be found. The light beam passes over a row of food embedded in one the walls -- strawberries, hot dogs, pickles -- nothing. Except -- that’s not a hot dog, it’s Flint in a bun! But the machine doesn’t see him, and the uvula returns it the gelatinous column to continue pumping food around the world.

dialogues.speaker: MACHINE VOICE, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: (FOOD WALLA)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flint slips out of the bun and inside a cocktail olive an runs over to a corner. He grabs items as he goes -- a str of spaghetti, a shrimp -- and ties them tightly together.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Grabbing. Tying. Throwing. ...then tosses the end with the shrimp through the hole o donut hanging from the ceiling and the tail of the shrimp hooks in.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Waiting...

dialogues.speaker: MACHINE VOICE
dialogues.text: (FOOD WALLA)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Flint times it so the machine has just “exhaled,” then sw out on the spaghetti strand...

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Swinging! ..-wrapping it around the uvula like a tetherball so that machine can’t suck in any clouds. Flint lands right next to the machine and immediately pul out his cell phone with the kill code.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 97.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Sorry old friend. The kitchen’s closed! He jams the phone into the machine’s port. But instead of the kill code, it turns out Tim sent him the CAT DJ VIDEO

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Dad, no... Suddenly the uvula rears up, snapping the spaghetti, lift the FLDSMDFR, and Flint has to hang on for dear life as t machine becomes a bucking bronco, flailing wildly and shooting food in all directions. Flint slips, barely holding onto one of the legs of the machine as he dangles above the huge pit. The FLDSMDFR sucks in clouds until the uvula looks like a giant balloon filling the most of the cave, and prepares unload on Flint. He looks down at the hole and notices his feet, still cov -- at always -- in the indestructible Spray-On Shoes. His eyes go WIDE. Flint pulls out his can of SPRAY-ON SHOES...

dialogues.speaker: MACHINE VOICE
dialogues.text: (FOOD WALLA)

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: When it rains, you put on a coat. Of spray-on shoes!!! Yeah! ...and SPRAYS the Chow Plopper, SEALING IT SHUT FOREVER. machine bursts at the seams. Flint looks up at the machine and steels himself...t hen GO and falls down through the food hole, out the column o black smoke as the machine explodes... BOOM! The explosio expands outward, following Flint down the hole. It gets closer and closer until it overtakes him.

dialogues.speaker: SAM, (0.S.)
dialogues.text: (GROGGY) What’s happening... Chickens... Manny grabs an EPI PEN and jams it into Sam’s leg and she wakes up with a start! Her swelling instantly goes down.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 98.

dialogues.speaker: SAM, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: Where’s Flint? As they streak towards us, the meateroid EXPLODES!

dialogues.speaker: NOO000000000
dialogues.text: Brent consoles Sam with a sticky, chickeny hug.

dialogues.speaker: BRENT
dialogues.text: I know, kid. I know.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Paris, London, New York -- a RIPPLE of explosive energy clears the skies. Everyone CHEERS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Everyone on the boats watches the explosion clear the sky Tim climbs out unharmed from the Port-A-Potty. He looks u at the sky and watches, hopeful, as the car-plane approac

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The breadboats return to shore as the car-plane lands. Th island is covered with giant food. Manny, Steve, Chicken Brent and Sam emerge to CHEERS. The Sam closes the door to the plane. Tim approaches Sam.

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: Flint?

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: (HANGS HEAD) I'm sorry.

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: Oh... Tim’s face falls. He starts to tear up. Sam puts her hand on Tim’s shoulder.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Your son was a great man. Behind them, a FLOCK OF RATBIRDS flies down from the sky. The crowd points and GASPS.  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 99. Sam and Tim turn to see ratbirds gently place a smoking, woozy Flint on the ground. Flint gives the ratbirds a thu up. They SQUAWK their approval. Everyone runs over to HUG our hero.

dialogues.text: (AWKWARD) Flint... oh. When you... when you cast your line... if it’s not straight... you, umm... Father and son stand there awkwardly. Beat.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Oh, for crying out loud. Sam tears off Steve’s THOUGHT TRANSLATOR and puts it on T Suddenly the box allows him to gush his true feelings.

dialogues.speaker: TIM, (THROUGH TRANSLATOR)
dialogues.text: I’m proud of you, Flint. I’m amazed that someone as ordinary as me could be the father of someone as extraordinary as you. You’re talented, you’re a total original and your lab is breathtaking. Your mom, she always knew you were going to be special and if she were alive today, she’d tell us both, “I told you so.” Now, look, when I take this thing off and you hear me make a fishing metaphor, just know that fishing metaphor means... (SPOKEN) I love my son. Flint hugs his dad. He’s never been happier. The crowd CHEEERS.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: I love you, too, Dad. Tim nudges Flint over to Sam. Flint turns to her.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT, (CONT'D)
dialogues.text: So where were we...?  CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF MEATBALLS 101.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: You were about to kiss me.

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Were you going to kiss me back?

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Why don’t you find out?

dialogues.speaker: FLINT
dialogues.text: Because I don’t want to go for it and then get shut down again.

dialogues.speaker: SAM
dialogues.text: Just kiss me! She closes her eyes and leans in, puffing her cheeks out the same never-kissed-anyone face Flint made earlier. Fli makes the same face and goes for it. It’s the most awkwar nerdiest, and somehow still immensely satisfying on-scree kiss ever. ON FLINT AND SAM, KISSING. As we begin a huge cinematic PULL OUT, we hear...

dialogues.speaker: TIM
dialogues.text: That’s my son.

dialogues.speaker: MAYOR
